title: Remove endorsements from builder GraphQL query
description: Edit `src/frontend/src/lib/graphql/queries/builders.ts` to remove the `endorsements { ... }` fragment from the GraphQL query. This ensures the query matches the updated backend schema.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `endorsements` field in any GraphQL query in builders.ts
- Query executes successfully against the backend
- Query returns valid builder data
- TypeScript compiles with no errors
